# Force Shield
## Overview
**Aura** moderate evocation; **CL** 9th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 8,500 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

An iron band, this simple ring generates a shield-sized (and shield-shaped) *[[Wall of Force (Spell)|wall of force]]* that stays with the ring and can be wielded by the wearer as if it were a heavy shield (+2 AC). This special creation has no armor check penalty or arcane spell failure chance since it is weightless and encumbrance-free. It can be activated and deactivated at will as a free action.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Wall of Force (Spell)|wall of force]]*

**Cost** 4,250 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 481
